definition: Mikoyan (name)/Anastas Ivanonovich Mikoyan (1895-1978), Soviet politician, politburo member in the 1950s and 1960s/Artem Ivanovich Mikoyan (1905-1970), brother of the politician and one designer of MiG military aircraft
